message.name: ERR_EDUCATION_FV_COURSETYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The course type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_EDUCATION_XRV_FROM_DATE_DOB
message.locale: Education From date must be after client's date of birth (%1d).

message.name: ERR_EDUCATION_XRV_FROM_DATE_DOD
message.locale: Education From date must be before client's date of death (%1d).

message.name: ERR_EDUCATION_XRV_TO_DATE_DOD
message.locale: Education To date must be before client's date of death (%1d).
